message.original: イリスの所在を確かめ神殿に連れ戻す
message.translation: Find Iris and bring her back to the temple

message.original: 謁見の間でイリスの行方を聞く
message.translation: Find Iris' whereabouts by talking to the people in the Audience Chamber

message.original: イリスの行方を追い温泉の地キノザへ向かう
message.translation: Head to the hot springs of Kinoza and find Iris's whereabouts

message.original: キノザ鉱泉の支配人ロイと話す
message.translation: Speak with manager Roy in Kinoza Mineral Springs

message.original: 謁見の間へ戻り経緯を報告する
message.translation: Report back to the Audience Chamber
